/* 회원목록 테이블의 전체 행의 갯수 검색시 바뀐데이터의 갯수에 맞춰 페이징을 넣기 위해 where절 추가 */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_user AS u INNER JOIN tb_user_level AS ul ON u.user_level_code = ul.user_level_code
${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');

/* 특정 회원 정보 조회 */ SELECT u.user_id ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_nickname ,u.user_level_code ,u.user_email ,u.user_phone_number ,u.region_sgg_code ,u.user_addr_desc ,u.total_exp ,u.total_mileage FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num ,l.login_code ,l.user_id ,l.login_date ,l.logout_date FROM tb_login AS l, (SELECT @rownum:=0) AS TMP WHERE l.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY num DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_login AS l WHERE l.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num ,sa.user_id ,sa.login_date ,max(l.login_date) AS lastLoginDate FROM tb_sleeper_account AS sa INNER JOIN tb_login AS l ON sa.user_id = l.user_id , (SELECT @rownum:=0) AS TMP WHERE sa.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') GROUP BY sa.user_id ORDER BY num DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_sleeper_account AS sa WHERE sa.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%');
SELECT l.user_id ,DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(l.login_date)) AS dateDiff FROM tb_login AS l GROUP BY l.user_id HAVING DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(l.login_date)) >= 180;
